Package photos.control

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
photos.control.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
The Photo class represents a photo object, with properties such as caption, image path, last modified date, and a list of tags. This class provides methods to retrieve and modify these properties, as well as methods to add and remove tags. The class also implements the Serializable interface to allow for saving and loading Photo objects.
Author:
Pavitra Patel, Huzaif Mansuri
